This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Scrapbook of photographs, programs, clippings, ticket stubs, dance cards, and other memorabilia, kept while a student at The University of Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Scrapbook of William Walter Wofford (AZ 041). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Mrs. William Wofford, 1961.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of photographs, programs, clippings, ticket stubs, dance cards, and other memorabilia, kept while a student at The University of Arizona.
